doc:
Doreen Sloane https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doreen_Sloane 0 Doreen Sloane (24 February 1934 in Birkenhead – 8 April 1990 in Liverpool) was an English actress best known for her roles in the soap operas Coronation Street, Emmerdale and Brookside. She trained at the Elliott Clarke Theatre School in Liverpool and appeared in repertory theatres before being cast in the first of four roles in Coronation Street. She also appeared in the films Yanks and Chariots of Fire. Other TV appearances include Nearest and Dearest, Emmerdale, Last of the Summer Wine and How We Used To Live. She died of cancer at the age of 56. The final scenes she recorded for Brookside went to air after her death. Doreen_Sloane ( 24_February_1934 in Birkenhead – 8_April_1990 in Liverpool ) was an_English_actress best_known for her_roles in the_soap operas Coronation_Street , Emmerdale and Brookside . She trained at the_Elliott_Clarke_Theatre_School in Liverpool and appeared in repertory_theatres before being_cast in the_first of four_roles in Coronation_Street . She also appeared in the_films_Yanks_and_Chariots of Fire . Other_TV_appearances include Nearest_and_Dearest , Emmerdale , Last of the_Summer_Wine and How We Used_To_Live . She died of cancer at the_age of 56 . The_final_scenes she recorded for Brookside went to air after her_death .
